tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Services (
  service_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  service_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  service_description TEXT,
  service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  provider_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Billing_Statements (
  statement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  statement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  appointment_type VARCHAR(30),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Telehealth_Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Billing (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_id INT,
  amount_due DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES Telehealth_Appointments(appointment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  appointment_time TIME NOT NULL,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Bills (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  service_id INT NOT NULL,
  bill_date DATE NOT NULL,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_statements (
    statement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    service_id INT,
    appointment_id INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    paid BOOLEAN,
    issued_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES services(service_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES appointments(appointment_id)
);
